channel.title: About on Yu Yamashita
channel.description: Recent content in About on Yu Yamashita

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Yu Yamashita! I’m an undergraduate student at the University of Tsukuba, where I’m part of the FusionCompLab. I’m looking for Ph.D. positions starting from Fall 2023! Education The University of Tsukuba, Japan B.S. in Library and Information Science, Apr. 2018 - Mar. 2023 Advisor: Atsuyuki Morishima Research Interests Human-AI collaboration, Crowdsourcing Publications Yu Yamashita, Hiroyoshi Ito, Kei Wakabayashi, Masaki Kobayashi, Atsuyuki Morishima. HAEM: Obtaining Higher-Quality Classification Task Results with AI workers.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: yu.yamashita.2021b@mlab.info Mailing Address University of Tsukuba 221B, Baker Street London United Kingdom -- Social Github Linkdin
